amendment.description: An amendment numbered 64 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to require a report on the Secretary of Transportation flight records.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 216 - 219 (Roll no. 352).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mrs. Miller (IL).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 216 - 219 (Roll no. 352).
